newsitem.title: PERU: Peru's stock, financial markets closed Mon, Tues.
newsitem.headline: Peru's stock, financial markets closed Mon, Tues.

text.p: The Lima Stock Exchange and Peru's financial markets will not open Monday or Tuesday due to a national holiday celebrating the 176th anniversary of the country's independence from Spain.
President Alberto Fujimori will deliver Monday a State of the Nation address before Congress about 1100 local (1600 GMT) to mark Independence Day.
The stock and financial markets will re-open Wednesday.
